revised_title: On the Structure and Relations of Alcyonarian Heliopora Cérulea and the Anatomy of a Species of Sarcophyton
tldr: The author examines the structure and relations of the alcyonarian coral Heliopora cèrulea and a species of Sarcophyton, as well as the structure of species of Millepora, Pocillopora, and Stylaster. The study provides insights into the anatomy and affinities of these corals, challenging previous classifications and theories on their relationships to other coral species.
